mapper.select: SELECT * FROM zd_vip_rent_price WHERE agent_id = #{agentId} and battery_type = #{batteryType} limit 1
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO zd_vip_rent_price( agent_id, battery_type, price_name, begin_time, end_time, customer_count, shop_count, is_active, create_time ) VALUES ( #{agentId}, #{batteryType}, #{priceName}, #{beginTime}, #{endTime}, #{customerCount}, #{shopCount}, #{isActive}, #{createTime} )
mapper.update: update zd_vip_rent_price set agent_id = #{agentId}, battery_type = #{batteryType}, price_name = #{priceName}, begin_time = #{beginTime}, end_time = #{endTime}, is_active = #{isActive} where id = #{id}
